re are therefore of the opinion that the defendants Otere Marshall (or Mars) and Adam Bourgeois have oomplied with all of the provisions of our law whioh enables them *294to retain possession as owners of the properties olalmed by them under their pleas of proscription of ten fears aooulrendl pausa as urged by them.
